title: LF duo silver+
body:
I had an Illaio that didn't use his brain and get armor cos Zed was fed.
I jungled and people didn't know how to wait for my ganks.
I got out of Bronze 5 in this account and need help to win some games.
I'm not the best player in the OCE but some people are just stupid and don't get the right items and still get the recommended items that don't suit the matchup

replies.body:
Here's a couple of tips:

1) If you duo, you'll get 3 monkeys on your team which makes your duo's job harder to carry.

2) If people at that elo are not making an effort to listen, it's best to ignore those players and just focus on the other players, or on your own gameplay. e.g. in the game where you were Vlad mid and Teemo was just feeding, and overextending, they did not listen after a couple of tries, so it's best to let them be. By using a bad player as bait sometimes you can still win the game (as what happened).

3) Don't give up just because you or someone else is doing badly. Focus on improving at the game, not climbing. Constant surrender votes when the score is roughly even does not help team morale. If you are going badly or even if you think the team is going badly, knuckle down and let others carry you (e.g. Vi and Sivir in that game). It's one of the [common misconceptions of soloqueue](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4JEWjxDSUIQ) that you HAVE to carry.

Good luck in soloqueue!
